::DeathScythe::

DeathScythe looks at the ship he had walked near. It was a big ship, and 
there appeared to be a battle going on.

"Scanners."

With that quiet command, scanner emerge out of one of his shoulder, scanning 
the battle.

"The traditional Maximal VS Predacon, eh?" he says quietly to himself, "Well 
well.... Hope those Maxi's are ready."

The assassin starts off at a run toward the ship, his gun ready.
